title: K 次取反后最大化的数组和 (Maximize Sum Of Array After K Negations)
content: 思路: // @Title: K 次取反后最大化的数组和 (Maximize Sum Of Array After K Negations) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-22 18:30:43 // @Runtime: 19 ms // @Memory: 41.2 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int largestSumAfterKNegations(int[] nums, int k) { if(k==0){ int sum=0; for(int i:nums){ sum+=i; } return sum; } //每次取反最小的 Arrays.sort(nums); nums[0]=-nums[0]; return largestSumAfterKNegations(nums,k-1); } }
